title: Journeyman AFK (~70)
comment_one: Journeyman has 4 talents that impact damage in tab 1. Once you get those maxed, it is up to you what you want - you can go for HP/defense for survivability, movespeed, etc
comment_two:
Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gain.
*1 - At this point, you can start putting some points into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you are looking for
notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash.
